name: Lost Souls (andrazg)
description:
Married couple during an incident. Spouce becomes a lost soul wondering the purgatory. He seeks salvation by unraveling the mistery behind the last moments on earth. Heavily story driven adventure with lots of easter eggs, hints and discoveries.

Discover your last moments on earth, what happened and why with a knowing that there is no wrong or right choice in life, there is only experience.

Here you can also see how we approached our development:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1Geud3vTsPvNM1hF4CSkGb7J8Uj7umb-F?usp=sha...

Peace. 

The dev team.
